item.title: My experience finding a new job as a software engineer in summer of 2020
item.description: In late summer of 2020 I moved from freelance software engineer to a full-time position. I want to outline this process for literally anybody who’s interested because I’ve found it useful when other people have done the same - like this post about interviewing at Google, this front-end, and this more generic post. Web development is a joyfully open community. There’s a lot of sharing, most often we share code, but we also share details about the wider context of our field.
